welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Otumba, Mexico! Get ready to be charmed by our rich history, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. Explore our city and discover its hidden treasures. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, mainly serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, exclusively serving international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the free WiFi network throughout the airport by selecting 'AICM Free WiFi' and completing a short registration process.
